channel.title: Compiling
channel.description:
i really need help. been trying to make my own server for a while now and i get this message every time i try to compile it :(.
"the system can not find the path specified. press any key to continue..."
then i press a key and it closes the screen and nothing happens : :confused: :mad:
someone help please? =) i would really appreciate it. im new to this whole server thing and it would be a big help.
PLEASE HELP ME? =) THANKS GUYS.

item.title: Compiling
item.dc:creator: @FSRDarkLight FSRDarkLight
item.description:
@FSRDarkLight wrote:

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe”
is the part where its messed up like 93dcthugs93 said
so you want to go to your program files then go to the folder named java you should see what kind of JDK you have if you only see JRE then download the newest java then install it. Now you should see something of lines like “jdk1.6.0_06”(FOLDER) there or what ever JDK you have. Just change the area of the JDK
so
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_4\bin\javac.exe”

to

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe”

just depends on what JDK you have

Read full topic

item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe”

that doesn’t exist on your computer. Umm… I would also get a different compiler if I were you.

item.title: Compiling
item.dc:creator: @Blakey_lol Blakey_lol
item.description:
@Blakey_lol wrote:

@echo off
title Galkons Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

thats what it says.

Read full topic
